CASE FILE #04g

THE RIOT TEST

Date: 9/8/2015

"Chaos reveals character. In three minutes of violence, pretense becomes impossible."

CLASSIFICATION: TOP SECRET
ACCESS LEVEL: SHADOW PROTOCOL PERSONNEL ONLY

Mission Summary

Routine prison tensions escalate into full-scale riot requiring intervention.

Alpha demonstrates advanced combat skills while appearing to act defensively.

Torretti witnesses Alpha's exceptional capabilities and tactical awareness.

Riot provides perfect cover for Alpha to display abilities without suspicion.

Key Evidence

Riot Survival Cards

Interactive analysis showing survival outcomes of various riot participants.

#interactive#analysis

Riot Audio

Ambient soundscape capturing the chaos and Alpha's calm efficiency.

#audio#atmosphere

Tactical Assessment

Torretti's post-riot evaluation of Alpha's combat capabilities.

#assessment#tactical

Mission Outcome

STATUS: CAPABILITIES REVEALED
Alpha's true skills demonstrated to Torretti, establishing mutual value recognition.

Alpha neutralizes multiple threats while maintaining low profile.

Torretti recognizes Alpha as exceptionally valuable asset.

Prison security identifies Alpha as stabilizing influence during violence.

Foundation established for formal alliance negotiations.

Connected Cases

CASE #04h
CASE 04H: THE MAFIA DEAL
→ Demonstrated capabilities lead to formal alliance proposal.
